title: Senior Bowl Scouting, The Ringer Draft Guide, and Getting Excited For the Super Bowl | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Danny Kelly calls in from Mobile, Alabama to give us his scouting report on the top seniors in college football after spending the week at the Senior Bowl (0:50) Then, we list the 10 reasons why we’re excited for the Super Bowl, kicking it off with the most fascinating coaching matchup in years (20:00).
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark
Guests: Danny Kelly

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
